page.title: 02OUR CURATE (Continued)
page.content:
He can wear black, blue or grey shirts; but, not red nor purple. Red represents the Queen's Chaplin, and purple represents a bishop.
He gets paid a stipend, which is like a salary. It is less money in many other jobs, but, his expenses are paid by the church: for example, his bills and car petrol, at the end of the month.
When he visits people, the duties are called pastoral duties. Mr.Springate prays several times throughout the day asking for things and thanking God.
{ Scott Drawler}
